content.html: Blocks are a safety issue. If someone is stalking you, or sending death threats, it’s not good enough to process the block later. (Yes, I know blocks can be circumvented, but this is still not a situation where you can say “yeah, it’s done” when it’s not actually done.)
content.value: Blocks are a safety issue. If someone is stalking you, or sending death threats, it’s not good enough to process the block later. (Yes, I know blocks can be circumvented, but this is still not a situation where you can say “yeah, it’s done” when it’s not actually done.)
